name: RedeemLoyaltyReward
description:
Redeem a loyalty reward for a customer purchase.

Use this tool to mark a loyalty reward as redeemed after a customer has completed a purchase. Suitable for use when processing orders outside the Orders API. Once redeemed, rewards cannot be reversed.

parameters.name: loyalty_reward_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the loyalty reward to redeem. Required for specifying which reward to process.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [loyalty reward](entity:LoyaltyReward) to redeem.

parameters.name: idempotency_key
parameters.description: A unique string to identify this `RedeemLoyaltyReward` request, ensuring uniqueness for each request.

value_schema.description:
A unique string that identifies this `RedeemLoyaltyReward` request. 
Keys can be any valid string, but must be unique for every request.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: The ID of the location where the loyalty reward is redeemed.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [location](entity:Location) where the reward is redeemed.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: reward_id
parameters.description: The ID of the [loyalty reward](entity:LoyaltyReward) to redeem.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [loyalty reward](entity:LoyaltyReward) to redeem.

parameters.name: idempotency_key
parameters.description:
A unique string that identifies this `RedeemLoyaltyReward` request. 
Keys can be any valid string, but must be unique for every request.

value_schema.description:
A unique string that identifies this `RedeemLoyaltyReward` request. 
Keys can be any valid string, but must be unique for every request.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: The ID of the [location](entity:Location) where the reward is redeemed.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [location](entity:Location) where the reward is redeemed.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
